name: Linux Configuration Options File
summary: Learn about .OPTS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Users sometimes create OPTS files when setting up network cards or other PCMCIA cards in Linux. One OPTS file can be found on the Knoppix or DSL Linux boot disks for setting boot options.

description: Options file used for installing and configuring various Linux applications and hardware devices; contains plain text instructions for an installer or program; can be used for overriding setup and installation options, or for specifying required application parameters.
